title: #36: Homicide Prevention - learning the lessons from the case of Zoe Dronfield
description:
Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti are joined by special guest Zoe Dronfield. Zoe escaped and survived a serial abuser and stalker who brutally attacked her while she slept. As a result of the attack, Zoe sustained extensive injuries, including stab wounds to the neck. She describes what happened that night, her attackers history and what needs to change to protect other future victims. 

#VictimsVoice #Paladin  #SerialStalkers #HerNameISZoe

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
